oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Jim Hurst Bluegrass Band - 2018-11-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by the Jim Hurst Bluegrass Band as part of the Bluegrass and Beyond celebration from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 10, 2018. Band includes Robert Bowlin-fiddle, Ashleigh Caudill-bass, Bobby Clark-mandolin, Kyle Triplett-banjo and Shelton Feazell on vocals. Recording includes sound check for the next performer. Third performance of four.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Hurst; Robert Bowlin; Ashleigh Caudill; Bobby Clark; Kyle Triplett; Sheldon Feazell;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments and introductions by Kayleigh Shoemaker begin in progress / (00:26) Performs Tall Pines / (04:23) Performs 17 Days / (07:44) Opening comments by Jim / (09:29) Performs Steven's Deep Coal Mine's / (13:26) Jim talks about writing songs and coal miners / (14:55) Introduces the next song / (15:35) Performs Unlucky Seven / (20:09) Performs Unidentified Song likely titled My Darling Cory Is Gone / (24:35) Introduction of Shelton Feazell / (25:09) Introduction of the next song / (25:36) Performs I Can Tell You The Time / (29:20) Shelton is asked about his musical history and discovering that he could sing bass / (30:56) Introduction of the next song / (31:23) Performs Big Iron / (35:26) Talks about the Marty Robbins Tales of The Gunfighter album / (36:02) Introduces the next song / (37:12) Performs Sin's Dark Valley / (40:43) Jim introduces the band members / (44:38) Introduces the next song / (45:06) Performs Darlin' Tell Me Why / (49:15) Performs Widows Weeds / (51:00) Talks about songwriter Claire Lynch and Jennifer Kimball / (52:36) Jim introduces the next song, thanks the band and venue staff / (54:18) Performs Lonesome Road Blues / (58:05) Final comments / (58:13) Walk-out music / (01:06:29) Walk-out music ends-audio muted / (01:07:07) Acoustic bass sound check / ((01:08:24) Muted audio / (01:08:51) Bass and mandolin sound check / (01:09:45) Muted audio / (01:10:03) Mandolin sound check / (01:11:02) Acoustic guitar sound check / (01:11:54) Muted audio / (01:13:19) Guitar and mandolin sound check / (01:14:10) Fiddle sound check / (01:15:18) Muted audio / (01:16:20) Banjo sound check / (01:17:07) Muted audio / (01:18:06) Vocal mic check / (01:18:08) Muted audio / (01:12:23) Full band instrumental sound check / (01:23:17) Full band sound check with vocals / (01:24:24) Muted audio / (01:24:32) FILE END
